Docs.summary: Converts an object to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> to and from a <xref:System.String>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> to and from a <xref:System.String>. Also, the command must be an existing command, or must be assigned to a public static property or public static field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> to and from a <xref:System.String>. Only existing (noncustom) commands can be returned.
